org.drip.measure.chisquare

Class R1UnivariateCentral

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.measure.continuous.R1Univariate
      • org.drip.measure.chisquare.R1UnivariateCentral

  • public class R1UnivariateCentral
extends R1Univariate
    R1UnivariateCentral implements the Probability Density Function for the Central Chi-Square Distribution. The References are:

    • Chi-Squared Distribution (2019): Chi-Squared Function https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chi-squared_distribution


    • Module = Numerical Core Module
    • Library = Numerical Optimizer
    • Project = Special Function Project
    • Package = Special Function Ordinary Differential Equations
